user_instruction: 'Tell John to send me (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) the additional information I requested for his job application, including his updated resume, professional references, and any recent certifications or awards. Remind him he can check his Gmail and Notion for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Additional Application Documents

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. To move forward with your application for the position at Tech Innovations Inc., could you please send me the following items at your earliest convenience?

• Your updated résumé  
• A list of professional references (with contact information)  
• Copies of any recent certifications or awards

You can find these materials in your Gmail or Notion workspace, if that’s helpful. Please email everything to me at sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com.

Thank you very much for your prompt attention to this. If you have any questions, just let me know.

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson  
HR Representative  
Tech Innovations Inc.

final_output:
